caption.p: (a) Seasonality in surface heat flux forcing associated with sea ice loss in the CMIP5 multimodel mean response (black line) and in the individual models (gray lines). (b) As in Figure 1a but for the response in the North Atlantic jet latitude and (c) in the North Pacific jet latitude. In Figures 1b and 1c the vertical bars are 95% confidence intervals on the multimodel mean response due to internal variability (see supporting information).
